text: Ashtonia is a genus of flowering plant belonging to the family Phyllanthaceae first described as a genus in 1968.Airy Shaw, Herbert Kenneth. 1968. Kew Bulletin 21: 357Tropicos, Ashtonia Airy Shaw It is native to the Malay Peninsula and Borneo.Kew World Checklist of Selected Plant FamiliesGovaerts, R., Frodin, D.G. & Radcliffe-Smith, A. (2000). World Checklist and Bibliography of Euphorbiaceae (and Pandaceae) 1-4: 1-1622.
